trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"></xref> events.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs"></xref> class.

When implementing a source for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events, pass in `true` for `previousModeAutoSized` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> already had an automatic resizing mode and the new mode is different.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> was previously set to automatically resize.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs> class is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events, so this property relates specifically to the previous state of either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
